summary: A collection of generic helper modules that provide the Mission Support System with core services such as configuration management, logging, error handling, authentication, data acquisition, geographic coordinate processing, unit conversion, time handling, thermodynamic calculations, NetCDF and OGC‑WMS interactions, Qt‑based UI utilities, automated plotting, and user‑token verification.
business_intent: Enable reliable, reusable, and centralized utilities that simplify development and operation of the Mission Support System, ensuring consistent handling of configuration, security, data access, scientific calculations, and user interfaces across the application.
